column4: hi guys, is there a problem with python upgrade to the newest version?
hi guys, is there a problem with python upgrade to the latest* version?
my programs made in python stoped working
it probably made python 3.0 default and it broke compatibility
to do that i have to import sys, right?
from what you told it seems python can not find that lib so it's not in path probably
yeah, you mean any lib doesnt work?
i can import math, for example
so i think it is not a problem in path, ok?
